mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.channel_id, u.user_info_id, u.user_name, u.PASSWORD, u.phone, u.nick_name, u.email, u.icon, u.wechat_id, u.alipay_id, u.create_time, u.create_user, u.modify_time, u.modify_user, u.is_enabled, r.role_id, r.role_name, r.role_key, r.role_sort, r.data_scope, r.is_enabled, r.is_deleted, c.channel_flg, c.channel_name FROM bus_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.role_id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_channel c ON c.channel_id = u.channel_id WHERE u.user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.channel_flg = #{channelFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND u.is_deleted = 0
